segments.text: I see the water just spilling everywhere, and it’s making me so frustrated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can the woman not notice something like that?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is going to be ruined if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids are just making things worse by climbing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless this whole situation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and the girl is just encouraging him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just step in and fix this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely clueless, and it’s infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I don’t even know how this could have gone on for so long.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is a disaster, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR
